## üéØ Key Capabilities
*   ‚ö° **Visual Workflow Creation**: Build automation sequences using drag-and-drop actions and pre-built modules.
*   üìÅ **File and Folder Automation**: Automate file processing, renaming, conversion, and organization tasks.
*   üîÑ **Application Integration**: Create workflows that span multiple applications and system services.

## About Automator Scripts
Automator Scripts provides a user-friendly approach to automation that empowers users to create custom workflows without requiring programming knowledge. The application builds upon the automation concepts pioneered in macOS Automator while extending compatibility to Windows platforms, offering a unified solution for automating repetitive tasks across both operating systems. By providing a library of pre-built actions and a visual interface for assembling workflows, Automator Scripts makes automation accessible to everyone from casual computer users to power users seeking to optimize their daily computing tasks.

The desktop application delivers comprehensive automation capabilities for both macOS and Windows environments, featuring a modular action system that can be extended with custom scripts and third-party plugins. Automator Scripts' intuitive workflow editor allows users to chain together actions for file processing, text manipulation, image conversion, and system control, with conditional logic and variable support for creating sophisticated automation sequences. With the ability to save workflows as standalone applications, folder actions, or scheduled tasks, users can deploy their automations in ways that seamlessly integrate into their existing computing habits and workflows.

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   200 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   200 MB of available storage space
